ygData.subject: Re: {General} Magic Robes
ygData.msgSnippet: Well you are plugging along nicely aren t you?   Good job.  I think most of us use the Equilizer site to get item stats. http://gameznet.com/eq/ Cloth, netted,
ygData.messageBody:
Well you are plugging along nicely aren't you? Good job. I think
most of us use the Equilizer site to get item stats.
http://gameznet.com/eq/

Cloth, netted, damask, woven, and gossimer are the equipment types to
keep an eye out for.

The important robes are listed too. Note that the best robe for a low
level is the yellow senior apprentice robe from Erudin at a cost of 4P.
I wore one until level 22 when I finally got a flowing black robe.



--- rich.hitz@... wrote:
> From: rich.hitz@...
>
> In my many wanderings of old and new characters I
> see
> others running around wearing very nice white, blue,
> and
> black robes. I have seen people /auction Damask
> robes
> and looking for another that I can't remember the
> name
> of.
> I just hit 5th last night (without using a pet up to
>
> now :) ) and would like to see a list of all the
> different robes available and their stats. I have a
> set
> of Damask pants (thanks to my wife) and would like a
>
> complete set. Anyone who knows what pieces are out
> there and what the benies are, please let me know.
> Also, you can spoile me as to where to acquire them
> too. :)
>
> Artimis
> Enchanter 2nd Rank
> Bretoxxulous
>
